backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor serving as placeholder backend.
feature_evidence.json: Metadata describing a feature request to darken the global background overlay in frontend/src/index.css.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: List of prewritten summaries for multiple frontend files and components.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base config and OKLCH CSS variables defining light/dark themes and global bg/text styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root component that applies theme and renders all major site sections with header and footer.
frontend/src/components/common/GlassCard: Reusable glass-effect card wrapper with optional hover and neon styles.
frontend/src/components/common/NeonButto: Custom neon-styled button with variants, sizes, and loading state.
frontend/src/components/contact/useConta: Hook managing contact form state, validation, submission simulation, and success handling.
frontend/src/components/layout/SectionSh: Generic section wrapper adding spacing, container layout, and optional glass styling.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteFoote: Footer with social links, attribution, and dynamic year display.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteHeade: Sticky header with theme toggle, smooth-scroll nav, and mobile menu handling.
frontend/src/components/portfolio/portfo: Defines the PortfolioItem interface and provides categorized sample portfolio items with thumbnails and embedded video links.
Declares media types and helpers for detecting video media and converting various video URLs into embed formats.
frontend/src/components/portfolio/Portfo: Modal displaying a portfolio item's video or image with ESC/backdrop close behavior.
frontend/src/components/sections/AboutSe: Renders an About section with an image, description, and a grid of creative tools.
frontend/src/components/sections/Contact: Implements a contact section containing a form with validation, success state, and social icons.
frontend/src/components/sections/HeroSec: Displays the hero banner with main headings, intro text, and buttons to scroll to portfolio or contact sections.
frontend/src/components/sections/Portfol: Shows categorized portfolio items with thumbnails and opens a preview dialog when an item is selected.
frontend/src/components/sections/Service: Lists available services with icons and descriptions in a grid layout.
frontend/src/components/sections/Testimo: Displays client testimonials inside card components with quotes and author info.
frontend/src/components/visual/Backgroun: Adds floating decorative bubble-like background elements with animation.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on the current Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication, including login, logout, and loading stored identities.
frontend/src/hooks/useScrollToSection.ts: Exposes a smooth-scrolling helper that scrolls to a DOM section with a fixed header offset.
frontend/src/hooks/useTheme.ts: Manages light/dark theme state, syncing it with localStorage and applying the theme class to the document root.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global Tailwind base styles, CSS variables for light/dark themes, and background/utility styles including neon and glass effects.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with QueryClient and InternetIdentity providers and loading global styles.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, animations, fonts, and utilities using CSS variables for theme-driven styling.
project_state.json: Describes the projectâ€™s state, features, and pending requests, including a task to darken the site-wide background.
